arts.ttl: This was really good – Wales boss Craig Bellamy finds positives in Iceland draw

arts.ttl: Wales surrender two-goal led in draw with Iceland
arts.sum: Iceland staged a second half comeback to earn a 2-2 draw at home to Wales in their Nations League Group B4 game on Friday, where the visitors looked in complete control at half time but the home side were much the better team after the break.

arts.ttl: Wales let two-goal lead slip as Iceland fight back to earn draw
arts.sum: Wales let a two-goal lead slip as Iceland stormed back to force a deserved 2-2 Nations League draw in Reykjavik.
